summary: BLACK TIGER KING - Meme Coin For the Future
proposal:
Hey there, Black Tiger King community! 🐯

Just like your token, we're all about empowering the community and creating a future that's as bright as the stripes on a black tiger. But instead of claws and roars, we've got an arsenal of B2B tools that can help your project grow.

1. 🔄 DEX (UNI FACTORY): Create your own DEX based on Uniswap V2. You get to decide everything, from the colors and logo to the fees. And the best part? It's a revenue share model, so you don't pay a dime upfront!

2. 🎰 Lottery: How about adding a bit more fun to the mix with a blockchain-based lottery? You can earn 0-30% commission and support tokens like your very own BTK!

3. 🪙 Wallet: A multicurrency crypto wallet that supports Bitcoin, Ethereum, and of course, BTK. It's like a tiger's den for your tokens.

4. 🌾 Farming: Attract investment by offering rewards with ERC20 Staking & Yield Farming. It's like a jungle out there, and we're here to help you thrive.

5. 🗳 DAO: Give your stakeholders a voice with our governance and proposal tools. It's time to hear the roar of the BTK community!

6. 🌉 CrossChain: Create an EVM compatible blockchain bridge. It's like building a bridge across the jungle, connecting all EVM blockchains.

7. 🚀 IDOFactory - Launchpad: Launchpad solution for IDO pools and token locking. Perfect for when BTK decides to reach for the stars!

Remember, it's all B2B, you're not just playing, you're creating. Interested? Then let's help the Black Tiger King rule the crypto jungle! 🐯👑

Check out our demos at https://t.me/onoutdemos and let's chat.
